definition: people from the same workplace or profession/co-worker/colleague/pop culture enthusiasts who create fan fiction etc

sentences.english: The area where otaku have the most influence in manga tends to be with dojinshi.
sentences.chinese: 御宅族在漫画领域最有影响的是同人志。

sentences.english: Among your friends, is there anyone who has seen 7's slash fanwork ?
sentences.chinese: 你朋友的名单里有人看过7的斜线同人吗？

sentences.english: The second most popular would be fan fiction. This is something that has really exploded on the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 第二受欢迎的同人小说，它在互联网上爆发式发展。

sentences.english: Also don't hang out with fag hags .
sentences.chinese: 也不要和同人女混在一起。

sentences.english: All fiction, in fact, is fan fiction.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，所有的小说都是同人小说。

sentences.english: Have you read any fan fiction?
Iwrote a lot of Star Wars fanfic thatyear.
sentences.chinese: 那年我写了很多星球大战的同人小说。

sentences.english: The fanfic habit isa literary habit.
sentences.chinese: 同人小说习惯是一种文学习惯。

sentences.english: Do you want to work with people or with animals?
sentences.chinese: 你是想同人还是想同动物打交道？

sentences.english: This site is all about Saint Seiya at China.
sentences.chinese: 本站系《圣斗士星矢》同人界相关中文站点。

sentences.english: He can look through clothes, paint h-dojinshi and awake your desire.
sentences.chinese: 他可以看穿衣物，绘制H同人志以及唤醒你的欲望。

definition: voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
OHBA Tsugumi (pen-name), author of cult series Death Note 死亡筆記|死亡笔记[si3 wang2 bi3 ji4]
script for play, opera, movie etc/screenplay/scenario
erotic (loanword mimicking the shape of Japanese katakana エロ, pronounced "ero")
Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]
